mapper.select: select id, `name` from tb_meeting_room where status = 1

select mr.id, mr.`name`, mr.max, mr.`desc`, mr.`status`, count(m.id) as meetings from tb_meeting_room as mr left join tb_meeting as m on m.status = 2 and mr.`name` = m.place
where mr.name like "%${name}%"
group by mr.id
having count(m.id) > 0
having count(m.id) = 0
limit #{start}, #{length}

select count(*) from ( select mr.id from tb_meeting_room as mr left join tb_meeting as m on m.status = 2 and m.place = mr.`name`
where mr.name like "%${name}%"
having count(m.id) > 0
having count(m.id) = 0
) as temp
select id, `name`, max, `desc`, status from tb_meeting_room where id = #{id}

select temp.name from ( select mr.`name`, m.id from tb_meeting_room as mr left join tb_meeting as m on mr.name = m.place and m.date = #{date} and ( (#{start} between m.start and m.end) or (#{end} between m.start and m.end) ) ) as temp where temp.id is null
